welcome_message:
This installer will set up S.T.A.L.K.E.R. G.A.M.M.A. modpack on your system.

G.A.M.M.A. (Great Anomaly Massive Modpack Alliance) is a comprehensive modpack for S.T.A.L.K.E.R.: Anomaly.

You can also optionally install AOEngine afterwards.
about_message:
S.T.A.L.K.E.R. GAMMA Launcher

Developed by: Mirrowel

Based on the open-source GAMMA launcher project by Mord3rca.

G.A.M.M.A. modpack created by Grokitach and contributors.

S.T.A.L.K.E.R.: Anomaly is a standalone modification by the Anomaly Development Team.

This launcher provides a streamlined installation experience for the GAMMA modpack and optional AOEngine integration.
ao_launcher_not_found: AOEngine Launcher not found in current directory
installation_success_message:
GAMMA installation completed successfully!

You can now:
1. Launch AOEngine Launcher to install AOEngine (if available)
2. Start ModOrganizer from the GAMMA folder
3. Configure your mods and start playing!
error_paths_required: Please specify both Anomaly and GAMMA installation paths
